description: We provide a pleasant user experience and convenience and we are also happy to inspire you with our functionalities and amazing food content. Our delivery services are equally well organized and strive to keep the shortest delivery time possible.

Tired of cooking the same 3 meals on repeat? Zest integrates a mind-blowing cooking education into your routine. Learn to cook with us through step-by-step explanations of foundational cooking concepts in fewer than 10 minutes and dishes that bring the concept to life. Our recipes are created by two former Michelin star chefs, distilled by a home chef, and cooked by you, the superstar home cook that you are (or will be). We don't assume any prior culinary knowledge. We meet you where you are and help you improve.
 
Stop copying traditional recipes - start learning from Zest. We've cooked those delicious Bon Appetit dinners. But when we took away the recipes we felt like lost puppies. Zest is designed to teach you the how's and why's of cooking. So when the recipe is gone you can confidently navigate the kitchen. The promise: Taste improvement after one dinner with Zest.

FEATURES:

STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS
We've all tried cooking a TikTok recipe. You rewatch the video 13 times to figure out what the hell is going on. Zest embeds videos throughout recipes so you can click into content when you need it. No more pausing and restarting. Learn at your own pace.
 
CONCEPT VIDEOS
Watch a short video on a new concept at your own pace and then cook recipes that reinforce what you've learned. We dive into topics like the science of tasting and the basics of seasoning, sautéing, roasting and more!

SKILL VIDEOS
Don't know how to dice an onion? Don't be embarrassed, we got you covered. Skill videos are linked in each recipe to guide you along, so you don't have to watch Gordon Ramsey on YouTube (we love his accent too).

CURATED MENU
Choose a menu to fit your preferences. Tired of wasting produce? Search for dishes including what’s already in your fridge. Got allergies? Compile safe recipes in your menu to find them when you’re ready to get cooking. 

GROCERY LIST
Shop your menu with our automated grocery list. Plus, utilize our helpful tips while you shop. Don't know what a neutral oil is? We got you covered.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
Rate the recipes you cook, so we can recommend similar ones.

Feedback? Technical Issues? Killer ideas you want to contribute to make our app better? Email us at support@zestapp.co. We're always here to help and would love to chef up new ideas together!

End User Licensing Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Order food online in Suriname with your iPhone or iPad via the FoodDelivery.sr app. Super simple!

Do you fancy a tasty noodle, roti, BBQ, rice chicken or pizza? Order the tastiest dishes with enormous ease at your favorite restaurants in Suriname. Whether you fancy Chinese, Indian, Italian or Fast Food: plenty of choice! The restaurant usually delivers your food (depending on the crowds) within 30-45 minutes.

Advantages of our app:
• Order your favorite food in just a few simple steps.
• View the restaurants that deliver your favorite meal to your door.
• Follow your order live through Live Tracking!
• Receive notifications about the status of your order.
• Prefer to pick up the food? Switch to takeout to see which restaurants you can pick up at.

How does it work:
Ordering is very simple. Use the automatic location recognition or manually enter the street where you want the food delivered. Paying is easy with pin at home, cash at the door is of course also possible.

Follow your order to the door:
Curious when your food will be delivered? With Live Tracking you can follow your order from the kitchen to the door! You will be kept informed of the status of your order via messages. You receive three messages: one to confirm your order and the preparation time, one when the delivery person has accepted the order with the delivery time, and one when your order is on its way.

All benefits at a glance:
• The design is sleek, innovative and easy to use!
• The app is well-arranged:
--- Overview of opening times.
--- Delivery costs clearly displayed.
--- Minimum order amount easy to find.
• Choose whether you want to pick up the food or have it delivered.
• Filter by rating, distance, popularity, newest restaurant, minimum order amount, delivery time, alphabet.
• The app is available in five languages. Switch easily between Dutch, English, French, Spanish or Portuguese.
• Log in with your existing account or create a new account.


Visit our website for more information: www.fooddelivery.sr

With the Thuisbezorgd app, you can order whatever you love, wherever you are. With a wide variety of restaurants, supermarkets and convenience stores to choose from, you can enjoy everything from burgers, pizza, pasta, sushi, salads and loads more, and get it all delivered to your door.

Need some bits from the supermarket? Just open the app, choose ‘groceries’ and fill your basket. Whether it’s baby food, flowers, beer, wine, beauty products, ice cream, chocolate, milk, fruit and bread, our partners have it all.

How it works:
Ordering is easy. You can either pick a saved address, fill in your postcode/street name or let the app find your location automatically. You can then choose your favourite restaurant or store and select whatever you fancy. 

Follow your order to your doorstep:
Track your order from the kitchen or store straight to your doorstep with our Food Tracker®. We'll even send you push notifications to update you about the status of your order. It usually takes 30-45 minutes to deliver your food or groceries.

What you get with our app:
- Quick and hassle-free ordering
- Great offers and discounts
- Choose to pick up your order at the restaurant or store
- Re-order the same delicious meal with one tap of a button
- Browse grocery stores, cuisines, offers, best-rated restaurants, nearby spots and vegetarian/halal options
- Get regular updates on your order with our handy Food Tracker®
- Choose from multiple payment options

Order from big brands or local heroes. 
Thuisbezorgd has it all!

Introducing "Menu Maker & Designer" - the ultimate app for effortlessly creating and designing stunning menus. Whether you're a restaurant owner, a cafe manager, this app is here to revolutionize your menu creation process.

With its intuitive interface and user-friendly features, Menu Maker allows you to craft captivating menus in just a few taps, even if you have no design experience. Choose from a wide range of over 1000+ ready-made menu templates, each crafted to perfection by professional designers. These templates cover various occasions and themes, ensuring that you'll find the perfect match for your establishment.

Menu Maker goes beyond just menus. It offers a comprehensive suite of advanced editing tools, enabling you to create all your marketing materials in one place. Customize your menus with unique and attractive designs that showcase your dishes in the most enticing way imaginable. The app offers an array of styles, presenting your menu items in visually stunning layouts that are sure to captivate your customers.

Whether you're in the bakery business, hosting a BBQ event, or managing a breakfast joint, Menu Maker has dedicated templates tailored to your specific needs. From dine-in menus to takeout menus, folded menus  and even gift certificates and business cards, this app covers it all. It's a one-stop solution for all your menu design requirements.

Once you've created your masterpiece, Menu Maker allows you to export your menus in high resolution, ensuring crisp and professional prints. Convenient and hassle-free, this feature saves you time and effort, enabling you to focus on providing exceptional culinary experiences to your patrons.

Unlock the full potential of your restaurant or food business with Menu Maker & Designer. Simplify the menu creation process, elevate your marketing materials, and make a lasting impression on your customers. Download the app now and experience the power of effortless menu design at your fingertips.

Subscription is required for the complete functionality of the app. We offer weekly and annual subscription plans.
Payments and Renewal: 
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Account settings at any time after purchase.
Terms of Service: https://www.app-privacy-policy.com/live.php?token=Zbkqk9hgSJLjpb18b0GuyO6EILWsj9By
Privacy Policy:  https://gist.github.com/adityaw114/947d16819256c78a3cb60ec99c292231

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

Have an idea to make your cooking experience with ReciMe better? Please email us at hello@recime.app so we can help!

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797

developer: iFood Agencia de servicos de restaurantes LTDA
description:
Compre em mercados, restaurantes, farmácias e pet shop de forma fácil e rápida, tudo a um toque de você. As ofertas dos melhores mercados e restaurantes da sua cidade estão no IFood. Aqui você também encontra produtos para seu pet além de comprar itens de farmácia.

Pensou em pedir comida? Peça no IFood! Ir ao mercado, farmácia ou pet shop? Esquece, vai de IFood!

Delivery de Restaurantes
Não importa se você quer comer sushi, comida vegetariana, hambúrguer, pizza ou experimentar um restaurante novo. Use o iFood e peça em vários restaurantes no melhor app de delivery de comida para sua fome e seu bolso, sem precisar esperar uma Black Friday

Delivery de Mercado
Bateu aquela vontade de preparar sua comida em casa ou faltou algum item da compra do mês? Você pode aproveitar nosso delivery de mercado para comprar os ingredientes que faltam e receber na sua casa!

Delivery de Bebidas
Que tal umas bebidas pra curtir com os amigos no fim de semana? Com o iFood você recebe as bebidas em casa e ainda economiza com cupons de desconto e ofertas.

Delivery de Farmácia
Precisa comprar remédios, fraldas, produtos de higiene, produtos de beleza ou algum outro item de farmácia? É só pedir pelo iFood! Compre remédios, produtos de beleza e outros itens de farmácia com cupons de oferta e descontos disponíveis nas farmácias mais perto de você.

Delivery de Pet Shop
Acabou a ração do seu pet? Precisa de areia pra sua gatinha? Não tem problema! Com o iFood você pode pedir ração, areia de gato, remédios veterinários e outros itens de pet com cupons de desconto e ofertas nos pet shops perto da sua casa.

Cupons e descontos pra vc
Com o iFood você sempre tem opção de mercado, restaurante, farmácia e pet shop pra comprar com qualidade gastando pouco sempre, não só na Black Friday. Confira os vários cupons disponíveis pra você e aproveite os descontos em restaurantes, supermercados, farmácia e pet shop com entrega grátis pra pedir a qualquer hora do dia.

Milhares de opções baratinhas
Use nossa busca ou navegue pelas categorias e listas especiais pra encontrar as ofertas de comida nos melhores restaurantes, promoções de bebida, pizzaria, farmácia, pet shop ou compra de mercado. Depois, é só colocar na sacola e fechar seu pedido online. Em pouco tempo, o entregador estará na sua porta com tudo o que pediu do restaurante ou supermercado.

Acompanhe seu pedido
No iFood você recebe sua entrega de comida e mercado rapidinho e ainda pode acompanhar as etapas de preparação do pedido e entrega pelo app. Aproveite para fazer suas compras de mercado, experimentar um restaurante novo ou agendar sua comida e receber em casa.

Baixe o app de delivery que traz para pertinho de você os seus pratos favoritos, ou se decidir cozinhar, você encontra todos os ingredientes de sua receita em alguns poucos toques em supermercados. Com nosso delivery, você pede pratos dos melhores restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e pet shop!

Tá esperando o que pra baixar nosso app de delivery de comida, mercado, farmácia e pet shop? Tenha os melhores supermercados e restaurantes, aquela pizzaria do bairro ou o mercado em que você sempre compra a apenas alguns cliques de distância. Aproveite para fazer seu pedido de comida e bebida e pedir sua entrega onde estiver. Tenha pizza, hambúrguer, comida vegetariana, sushi, fast food, comida italiana e muitos outros pratos do seu restaurante ou supermercado favorito na sua casa.

Veja a lista completa das cidades onde tem entrega do iFood. Peça agora seu delivery de comida e mercado online: https://www.ifood.com.br/cidades-atendidas

Welcome to Eatr - the ultimate companion for everyone from cooking novices to seasoned chefs! 
Our app is designed to guide you through a culinary adventure tailored just for you. Whether you're pressed for time or looking to indulge in a leisurely cooking spree, Eatr has you covered.

Time Management in Your Kitchen:
Choose your cooking time - from quick 15-minute bites to sumptuous meals under an hour - and let Eatr plan your menu. Busy schedules have met their match with our smart, time-conscious recipes.

Get Inspired:
Dive into thousands of mouth-watering recipes. With Eatr, discover daily inspiration and never run out of ideas for your next meal.

Personalized Skills Journey:
Whether you’re just starting out or are a kitchen pro, Eatr grows with you. Select your skill level and get recipes that challenge and excite you, all the while expanding your culinary prowess.

Dietary Preferences? We Listen:
Keto? Vegan? Pescatarian? No matter your diet, Eatr offers personalized recommendations to keep you aligned with your lifestyle choices. Sticking to your diet was never this effortless or delightful.

Powerful Filters for Tailored Search:
With robust search filters for cuisine, diet, meal type, and more, find exactly what you fancy with just a few taps.


Ratings and Feedback:
Be part of a community where your opinion matters. Rate recipes, helping others and yourself to the best-tasting dishes.

Nutritional Insight:
Stay informed with detailed nutritional information for each recipe, ensuring you meet your health and fitness goals.



Easy Cooking with Step-by-Step Guides:
Clear, concise, and easy-to-follow instructions take the guesswork out of cooking. Enjoy the process as much as the result!

Terms of use: https://eatr.com/terms_of_service

developer: Istidamat Albarakah Information Technology Company, LLC
description:
Save Meals. Enjoy Deals. Share the Barakah

Barakah connects you with surplus meals from top restaurants, cafés, and bakeries — fresh, delicious, and up to 70% off every day!

Why You’ll Love Barakah
- Discover great meals for less.
- Follow your favorite spots and get instant updates on surplus meals nearby.
- Explore Member Experiences—see what others got, share your finds, and discover hidden gems from the Barakah community.
- Send a Gift Voucher—share blessings with friends and family, and let them enjoy a meal full of Barakah. 
- Pay easily with Apple Pay, Mada, or credit card.

How It Works
Restaurants and cafés sometimes end their day with perfectly fresh meals that just didn’t sell.
Barakah gives these meals a second chance—offering them to you at up to 70% off.
You save money, reduce waste, and enjoy good food that deserves to be shared.


Available in all major cities in KSA. 
Want to see us in your city? Follow us on social media and send us a direct message of where you would like us to come next!

Don't miss out on our 100% fresh deals! Download the app now and enjoy blessings in every bite.


Follow us for sustainability tips, new restaurants, exclusive offers, and community stories!

Instagram - @barakahapp
Twitter - @barakahapp
TikTok - @barakahapp

Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

Alles voor de boodschappen bij Jumbo, in je broekzak
Met de vernieuwde Jumbo app doe je nóg slimmer boodschappen. Of je nu thuis bestelt of in de winkel staat, je hebt alles bij de hand: van je boodschappenlijst tot je Jumbo Extra’s pas. Ontdek het gemak van online bestellen en spaar punten voor gratis Extra’s. Je profiteert van de service, ruime keuze en topkwaliteit producten tegen lage prijzen, die je van ons gewend bent.

Dit kun je allemaal met de Jumbo app:

Slim en snel boodschappen doen
- Blijf op de hoogte van alle aanbiedingen én alle voordelen van Jumbo Extra’s
- Bekijk uitgebreide productinformatie van ons volledige assortiment
- Bestel eenvoudig je boodschappen online 
- Gebruik je boodschappenlijst, handig voor online bestellen én in de winkel

Alle voordelen van Jumbo Extra’s
- Scan je (digitale) Extra’s pas, spaar punten en wissel ze in.
- Bekijk je puntensaldo
- Alle producten waarop je punten spaart in één overzicht
- Wissel je punten in voor de leukste extra’s
- Spaar digitaal zegels voor onze spaaracties
- Activeer en profiteer wekelijks van 6 persoonlijke aanbiedingen

Inspiratie en gemak
- Kies uit meer dan 20.000 simpele, betaalbare en vooral lekkere recepten
- Bewaar je favoriete producten en recepten in Mijn Jumbo
- Bekijk elke week onze nieuwe folder
- Zie wat jij eerder gekocht hebt in je ‘Eerder gekocht’ lijstje

Jouw mening telt
We verbeteren onze app continu. Heb je een tip of vraag? Neem contact op met onze klantenservice, zie www.jumbo.com/contact.

Deze applicatie maakt gebruik van cookies (uitlezen van gegevens van je apparaat). Verder worden er met behulp van de applicatie ook op andere wijze persoonsgegevens over jou verzameld. Als je er voor kiest om deze applicatie te downloaden en te gebruiken ga je er mee akkoord dat we i) deze cookies plaatsen en we daarmee ook persoonsgegevens verzamelen en ii) we op andere wijze persoonsgegevens over jou verzamelen. Op deze manier krijgen we een goed beeld van jou als gebruiker en kunnen we aanbiedingen doen die voor jou interessant zijn. Wil je meer lezen over cookies en de wijze waarop we jouw persoonsgegevens gebruiken? Klik dan op de hieronder opgenomen link ‘Privacybeleid’ die verwijst naar het cookie statement en het privacy statement van Jumbo. Of ga naar: www.jumbo.com/service/cookies-privacy
This is solely intended for Merchant owners and/or managers on our Ride Eats Merchant platform.

Alle voordelen op een rij:
- Mis geen aanbiedingen of Kanskoopjes

Je vindt bij Dirk altijd de beste weekaanbiedingen vanaf woensdag. Wil je weten welke acties er volgende week zijn? Dan zie je vanaf vrijdag alle aanbiedingen van de week erop. Ook vind je elke zondag nieuwe Kanskoopjes. Wees er snel bij, want OP=OP!

- Digitale folder bij de hand
Wil je snel alle aanbiedingen doorbladeren? Dan heb je de digitale folder altijd bij de hand in de App. Vanaf vrijdag blader je ook alvast door de nieuwe folder.
 - Boodschappenlijst maken
Maak snel en gemakkelijk je boodschappenlijst en streep de producten af. Zo loop je de winkel uit met alle boodschappen in de kar. Wanneer je inlogt in de App, deel je gemakkelijk de boodschappenlijst met je partner, familie of huisgenoot. Pas je iets aan de lijst aan? Dan is het direct voor iedereen zichtbaar. Klaar met de lijst? Verwijder hem dan of sla hem op voor als je de lijst vaker wil gebruiken!

- Voordelig koken met Dirk
In de App vind je een gevarieerd aanbod aan recepten. Zo maak jij heerlijke, gezonde recepten zonder teveel hiervoor te betalen.

- Dirk-winkels
Vind in één oogopslag alle Dirk-winkels inclusief de openingstijden per filiaal. Daarnaast vind je plaatselijke aanbiedingen en overige winkelinformatie. Denk aan Too Good To Go en parkeermogelijkheid.

** Apple’s App of the Day in 120+ Countries **  

** Used by 2M+ Chefs Worldwide **  

"Unlimited amount of inspiration" — Netflix Superstar Ana Roš


Gronda is the #1 app for professional and home chefs. Learn from the world’s best, fine dining recipes, and connect with a global community of culinary experts. Discover inspiration, sharpen your skills, and build your personal brand as a chef.

Explore an extensive library of 50,000+ recipes from top chefs, 60+ masterclasses from industry legends, and exclusive content from chefs at starred restaurants. Use cutting-edge tools like the AI Recipe Creator to craft unique dishes, and join a community of over 2M chefs.

Subscribe to PRO to access premium content and support the chefs who inspire you. Whether you're an aspiring home chef or a seasoned professional, Gronda is your gateway to the culinary world.

GRONDA FEATURES

RECIPES FROM STARRED CHEFS 
* Find 50,000+ recipes chefs actually cook in their restaurants.  
* Exclusive content from 1,500+ chefs at starred restaurants.  
* Explore fine dining recipes and discover new inspiration for your dishes.

MASTERCLASSES FROM INDUSTRY LEGENDS
* 60+ classes from world-renowned chefs, including:  
  - Ana Roš (***), Alex Atala (**), Pascal Barbot (***), and Jan Hartwig (***).  
  - Chefs featured on the 50 Best list, including the Best Restaurant of 2024.  
* Learn techniques and tips that transform your cooking.  

ALL TOPICS COVERED
* Techniques (Sous-vide, Fermentation, Gelification, Dehydrating, Emulsifying, Freezing, Spehrification, Baking, Drying, Pressure Cooking, and many more)
* Pastry  
* Plating techniques  
* Seasonal ingredient selection  
* Flavor balancing  
* Sauce creation (Hollandaise, Béchamel, emulsifications)  
* Dessert techniques (e.g., tempering chocolate, macarons)  
* Protein preparation  
* Knife skills  

COMMUNITY OF CHEFS
* Join 2M+ chefs worldwide, from home cooks to culinary professionals.  
* Connect, share, and grow together in the only platform for real chefs.  
* Follow chefs and restaurants you love.

AI RECIPE CREATOR
* Use the power of AI to craft new variations of recipes.  
* Get creative and elevate your culinary skills.

BUILD YOUR BRAND  
* Share your recipes and creations with the community.  
* Create menus and collections with your favorite recipes. 
* Gain followers to build your reputation.  

ALSO FEATURING
* Daily inspiration from hundreds of famous chef creators.  
* Content available in English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese.  

Gronda is your ultimate culinary companion, no matter your skill level. By subscribing to PRO, you support the chefs who create the recipes and classes that inspire you.

Subscription pricing and terms:

Gronda offers an auto-renewing subscription to PRO, unlocking access to premium content and tools while supporting the chefs. Payment is charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase. Manage your subscription in your Account Settings.

Data protection: https://gronda.com/legal/privacy
Terms of use: https://gronda.com/legal/conditions-user

description:
Macro helps in adopting the healthy lifestyle that seamlessly syncs your body and weight
The diet and nutrition app keeps track of your dietary habits and provides personalized diet plans that help you meet your health goals in a fast turnaround

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

When you want pizza, you really want pizza. Luckily, our app is the quickest and easiest way to order one with a whole host of exclusive features. Want to know more? Course you do…


ORDER PIZZA

Scroll through our easy-order menu and treat yourself to an all-time classic or discover something new! You can even Create Your Own customised creation, give it a name and save it for next time. 


DELIVERY OR TAKEAWAY

Whether you want to collect from your local store or have your pizza delivered to your door, our app’s got you covered. With stores up and down the country, you’re sure to find a Domino’s Pizza near you. 


EXCLUSIVE PIZZA DEALS

If deals are your thing, you’ve come to the right place (almost). Download our app and you’ll find dozens of exclusive pizza deals to suit any budget (and any occasion). You can even add your vouchers to bag discounts on your order!


GROUP ORDERING

If you need to order pizza for the whole fam, you can set up a group order to make ordering for the gang a doddle. Just send them an invite, let them choose what they want and it’ll get added to the order! 


PRE-ORDERING

If you know you want pizza later, but you’re ready to order now…no worries. Get your order in early, let us know when you want it, and we’ll do the rest. Oh, and if you know you want the same as last time, you can just choose it from your order history! 


PAYMENT

Oh, and when it comes to settling up, you can pay pretty much however you like…using card, PayPal or with just a few taps thanks to Apple Pay. Plus, you can keep an eye on your pizza’s progress with our trusty pizza tracker.
 

So, if you haven’t downloaded our app yet, you’re missing out on everything you love about Domino’s and so much more. 

Hit the link to download now and see it with your own eyes!

By downloading and using this app, you confirm that you accept our Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy too.

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Discover everything Crumbl all in one place with the Crumbl App! Need a sweet treat? Whether you prefer pickup, delivery, or catering, we’ve got you covered! Download now and start earning Crumbl Rewards!

Collect Rewards
Earn points with every order—pickup, delivery, or catering. The more treats you enjoy, the more Rewards you earn!

Pickup
Order from your phone and skip the line! Your desserts will be ready and waiting. Prefer curbside pickup? Stay comfortable in your car—we’ll bring them right to you.

Delivery
Order fresh, delicious desserts without ever leaving your couch. Perfect for a cozy night in—order from the app and we’ll deliver right to your door.

Catering
Planning an event? Make it unforgettable with Crumbl. Whether it’s a wedding, office party, graduation, or casual get-together, select your flavors and quantities, and we’ll take care of the rest. Flavors may vary by location.

Gifting
Delight friends and family with a box of delicious treats or a Crumbl Gift Card.

Never Miss a Thing
Stay in the loop with notifications on promos and weekly menu updates. You’ll always be the first to know what’s baking!

Manage Your Account
Easily update your account details, from preferred payment methods to delivery addresses—all in one convenient place.

Download the Crumbl App today and make every moment a little sweeter!

SousChef AI – Your Personal Cooking Assistant

Transform the way you cook with AI-powered recipe discovery and real-time cooking guidance. Snap a photo of any dish to get the recipe,
scan your ingredients for instant meal ideas, or chat with AI to create personalized recipes. Cook with confidence using step-by-step
guidance and live AI assistance.

FEATURES

- Snap a Dish to Get Recipe – See a delicious meal at a restaurant, in a cookbook, or online? Take a photo and instantly get a complete
recipe with ingredients and step-by-step instructions. Our AI identifies the dish and generates professional-quality recipes.
- Snap Ingredients to Get Recipe – Photograph ingredients in your fridge or pantry. AI recognizes everything and suggests multiple
recipes you can make right now. Reduce food waste and never wonder "what can I cook with this?" again.
- Chat to Create Recipes – Describe what you're craving in natural language. "Spicy chicken pasta for 4 people" or "healthy vegetarian
dinner." AI understands your preferences and generates personalized recipes instantly.
- Live AI Cooking Assistant – Get real-time help while you cook. Ask questions about any step, upload photos of your cooking progress for
 instant feedback, and receive guidance tailored to where you are in the recipe.
- Step-by-Step Cooking Mode – Cook with confidence using interactive cooking guidance. Track your progress, check off ingredients, follow
 visual step indicators, and use built-in timers for perfect results every time.
- Adjust Servings Instantly – Scale any recipe from 1 to 12 servings. All ingredient quantities automatically recalculate in real-time.
- Convert Measurements – Toggle between metric and imperial measurements with one tap. All ingredients update instantly across the entire
 app.
- Custom Cookbooks – Organize recipes your way. Create unlimited cookbooks, categorize by cuisine, meal type, or any system that works
for you. Add recipes to multiple collections.
- Visual Cooking Guides – Auto-generated images for complex cooking steps help you visualize techniques and achieve better results.
- Smart Recipe Details – See exactly which ingredients you need for each step (no more scrolling back and forth). Clear time estimates,
skill levels, nutritional information, and emoji icons for visual clarity.

OTHER FEATURES

- Toggle screen lock off while cooking so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Step-specific ingredient lists show what you need right when you need it.
- Temperature guidance with automatic Celsius/Fahrenheit conversion.
- Comprehensive onboarding to personalize recipes based on your dietary preferences, favorite cuisines, and cooking goals.
- Recipe progress tracking across all cooking sessions.
- High-quality generated images for every recipe.
- Optional ingredients clearly marked.
- Interactive tutorials for all features.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

SousChef AI includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1. Generate unlimited recipes from dish photos, ingredient scans, and chat.
2. Access unlimited cooking sessions with live AI assistance.
3. Use unlimited photo analysis for cooking feedback.

You can start a 3-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial,
you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The SousChef AI Premium
subscription renews automatically at the end of each period until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal
will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current
period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.
